Women's & Gender Studies.1: Demonstrate knowledge of women, gender, and/or sexuality in history.
Women's & Gender Studies.2: Indicate familiarity with women writers and women's rhetoric as well as representations of gender and/or sexuality in literature.
Women's & Gender Studies.3: Show comprehension of major issues regarding women, gender, and/or sexuality, and transnational feminisms.
Women's & Gender Studies.4: Display awareness of global issues concerning women, gender, sexuality and transnational feminisms.
Women's & Gender Studies.5: Demonstrate knowledge of a diversity of feminist theories, methodologies, and perspectives.
Women's & Gender Studies.6: Analyze intersections of gender with other social identities such as race, religion, social class, ethnicity, nationality, age, physical ability, and sexual orientation.
Women's & Gender Studies.7: Synthesize material from diverse disciplines and experiences and apply a "gender lens" to reflect critically on women, gender, and sexuality.
